name: TB - TwisterMc's "Make TB labels stand out"
description:
Thunderbird's (v.2) msg tagging changes the foreground msg color: this style makes a tagged msg stand out by changing its background color. Applies to default and custom tags. Not my own work. Refs:
(a) TwisterMc
http://www.twistermc.com/blog/2007/04/10/thunderbird-labels
http://www.twistermc.com/blog/2007/05/02/custom-thunderbird-labels
(b) and The-Daily-Poll (Rassi)
http://the-daily-poll.com/wp-content/uploads/2007/05/complete_twistedmc_labels.txt
